name: @nota/nativescript-downloadmanager
description: Plugin for Nativescript, which wraps background download-managers on iOS and Android

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.reload: cd demo && tns plugin remove @nota/nativescript-downloadmanager && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.reload.sync.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns livesync ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && npm run reload
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
